sentences.en: A classic example comes from comedian Jack Benny , famous for his parsimony.
sentences.cn: 有个经典例子出自以吝啬著称的喜剧演员杰克·班尼.

sentences.en: He started as a stand-up comedian (= someone who tells jokes to an audience ) .
sentences.cn: 他最初是一名单口喜剧演员。

sentences.en: I'm going to write good jokes and become a good comedian.
sentences.cn: 我打算写一些精彩的笑话，成为出色的喜剧作家。

sentences.en: My special guest will be comedian Ben Elton.
sentences.cn: 我的特邀嘉宾将是喜剧演员本·艾尔顿。

sentences.en: That comedian sometimes acts a bit daffy.
sentences.cn: 那位滑稽演员有时行为古怪.

sentences.en: The audience laughed at the comedian's wit.
sentences.cn: 喜剧演员的风趣使观众发笑.

sentences.en: The comedian enjoyed great popularity during the 30's.
sentences.cn: 那位喜剧演员在三十年代非常走红.

sentences.en: The comedian gave a long monolog of jokes.
sentences.cn: 喜剧演员讲了一长段由笑话组成的独白。

sentences.en: The comedian gave a long monologue of jokes.
sentences.cn: 喜剧演员讲了一长段由笑话组成的独白.

sentences.en: The comedian really knocked the audience dead.
sentences.cn: 那位喜剧演员真是使观众五体投地.

sentences.en: The comedian tickled the crowd with his jokes.
sentences.cn: 喜剧演员的笑话把人们逗乐了.

sentences.en: The comedian's act drew a large crowd.
sentences.cn: 那个喜剧演员的表演吸引了一大批观众.

sentences.en: The comedian's joke elicited applause and laughter from the audience.
sentences.cn: 那位滑稽演员的笑话博得观众的掌声和笑声.

sentences.en: The comedian's jokes brought the house down.
sentences.cn: 丑角的表演博得全场喝彩.

sentences.en: The comedian's performance was the pits!
sentences.cn: 这喜剧演员的表演糟透了.

sentences.en: We were all highly amused by the comedian's antics.
sentences.cn: 小丑的滑稽表演逗得我们哈哈大笑.

phrases.tran_cn: 单口相声演员；独角滑稽秀演员

trans.tran_cn: 喜剧演员，丑角，滑稽的人
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to tell jokes and make people laugh
